title: 2017 Week 8 recap: JuJu shines again for Steelers, & how Zeke's looming suspension affects the NFC East
itunes:title: 2017 Week 8 recap: JuJu shines again for Steelers, & how Zeke's looming suspension affects the NFC East
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler & Gregg Rosenthal recap all of the Week 8 action, including a possible 'Game of the Year' contender between the Seahawks and Texans (1:00); The Bills continue to roll as they held off the deflated Raiders (9:00); A swole Nick Shook joins the heroes to break down the Cowboys' encouraging win over the Redskins and what lies ahead Ezekiel Elliot (15:00); The sad, sad Browns lose again (26:30); Dan's Dad -- Keith Hanzus -- weighs in on his lowly Jets (37:00); And with JuJu-Smith Schuster taking over the Steelers' offense, what does it mean for Martavis Bryant? (56:30).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
